title: TweetCaster Pro for Twitter v7.7 [APK]
description:
TweetCaster has a gorgeous look with an intuitive interface that makes it super easy to use while packing in tons of features. Optimized for both phones and tablets, TweetCaster has been highly praised by users and reviewers.
Features:
* Multiple Twitter Accounts Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Manage and easily post to multiple Twitter accounts
* Facebook Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Simultaneously post to Twitter and Facebook
* Notifications Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Get notified of new tweets, mentions, messages, or by specific user. Notifications are expandable and actionable on Android 4.1+

* Zip It Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Zip annoying tweeters or keywords from your timeline without unfollowing

* Long Tweets Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Use Twitlonger to tweet over 140 characters
